trans-unit.source: Represents the result of a hit test along a ray.
trans-unit.target: Representerar resultatet av en träffar test längs en ray.

trans-unit.source: If a ray hits a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>, you can cast to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult> to get even more detailed information about the intersection.
trans-unit.target: Om en ray träffar ett <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>, du kan byta till en instans av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult>få ännu mer detaljerad information om skärningspunkten.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayMeshGeometry3DHitTestResult> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance between the hit intersection and the inner coordinate space of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> which initiated the hit test.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar avståndet mellan träffar skärningspunkten och inre koordinaten utrymme för den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref> som initierade träffar testet.

trans-unit.source: Double that indicates the distance between the hit intersection and the inner coordinate space of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> which initiated the hit test.
trans-unit.target: Dubbel-värde som anger avståndet mellan träffar skärningspunkten och inre koordinaten utrymme för den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref> som initierade träffar testet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Model3D intersected by the ray along which the hit test was performed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Model3D överlappar ray längs som träffar testet utfördes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Point3D at the intersection between the ray along which the hit test was performed and the hit object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Point3D i skärningspunkten mellan ray längs som träffar testa utfördes och träffar objektet.

trans-unit.source: Point3D at which the hit object was intersected by the ray.
trans-unit.target: Point3D då objektet träffar var överlappar med ray.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Visual intersected by the ray along which the hit test was performed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Visual som överlappar med ray längs som träffar testet utfördes.
